name: BlackStories
0:
”Alexa, open black stories”
”Alexa, start black stories”
”Alexa, ask black stories for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: black stories
des:
Black Stories is a curated list of historical facts and stories from Black America. The best way to move the country to a place where all people feel included and respected is to know where we came from. Black Stories shows the rich history Black Americans have been a part of and how it has contributed to where America is today. 

Black Stories will be updated as long as all of you keep coming back to learn more!

To use the Skill say "Alexa Open Black Stories." When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
